original_text: So, brothers, in whatever condition each was called, there let him remain with God.
korean_text: 형제들아 너희는 각각 부르심을 받은 그대로 하나님과 함께 거하라

sentences.original_text: in whatever condition each was called,
sentences.korean_translation: 각각 부르심을 받은 그 상태 그대로,

sentences.original_text: there let him remain with God.
